overview: Father Conroy  has a parish which serves the acting and performance community. When one of his parishioners gets too sick to work, his daughter Holly finds a job working for a dance club of questionable character, which is run by Tony Vincent. Vincent never made the big time, and Father Conroy tries to look after Holly.
tagline: THERE'S A LITTLE CHURCH AROUND THE CORNER... a song's throw from Times Square... a dance step from Broadway... and a heartbeat from each of us!
title: Say One for Me
